DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to answer a key question in the field of implementation science. Specifically, it seeks to determine if a proposed model for the implementation and scale-up of healthcare innovations (the AIDED model) is effective and useful. To fully evaluate the potential of this model, the investigators will conduct a multi-year study comprising 3 phases. This proposal represents the first of these phases.
DOC.brief_title: Statin Choice Decision Aid Implementation First Phase
DOC.criteria: Subjects of the Mayo Clinic Care Network
